cast.overview: A girl who halfheartedly tries to be part of the "in crowd" of her school meets a rebel who teaches her a more devious way to play social politics: by killing the popular kids.
cast.title: Heathers

cast.overview: A town—where everyone seems to be named Johnson—stands in the way of the railroad. In order to grab their land, robber baron Hedley Lamarr sends his henchmen to make life in the town unbearable. After the sheriff is killed, the town demands a new sheriff from the Governor, so Hedley convinces him to send the town the first black sheriff in the west.
cast.title: Blazing Saddles

details.biography: Patrick Francis Labyorteaux (born July 22, 1965) is an American actor. He is best known for his roles of Andrew "Andy" Garvey on the NBC series Little House on the Prairie as well as Bud Roberts on the CBS series JAG and NCIS. He is the brother of actor Matthew Labyorteaux, who also appeared as a child actor on Little House on the Prairie as Albert Ingalls.
details.name: Patrick Labyorteaux
